column4: even if someone is willing to package it, it will take some time.
if it arrives before Slackware 11 I may stick with Ubuntu ;-)

I experimented with debian packages awhile ago for a pet software project, and it was actually not hard (if I can do it, probably most people can)... http://www.debian.org/doc/maint-guide/ is your friend
I have a baby on the way. I am doing a trial of Ubuntu coming from Slack; If I still have to compile, and it takes any effort, I'm off back to Slack
